Headline: Wimbledon is cancelled
Description: Founded in 1877, it had previously been called off only during World War I and World War II

Headline: Messi announces additional Barca pay cut
Description: Players move so that the club's other employees can earn their full salaries during the coronavirus crisis

Headline: Olympics set for July 2021 start
Description: The postponed Olympic Games will now begin on July 23 next year and run until Aug 8

Headline: Juve players, coach agree pay cut
Description: Coronavirus impacts football dramatically, infecting players, staffers and forcing matches to be postponed or played behind closed doors

Headline: Rescheduled Tokyo Games may come before summer 2021
Description: It faced ‘thousands’ of logistical and financial problems, the head of the global Olympic movement says

Headline: Messi donates $1.08m to battle virus
Description: Guardiola donates the same amount for the cause

Headline: Tokyo Olympics delayed to 2021
Description: Coronavirus pandemic forces the first postponement in the Games' 124-year modern history

Headline: Tokyo 2020 Games will bepostponed: IOC member
Description: Olympic body and Japan promise decision within month

Headline: La Liga postponed indefinitely
Description: The games will remain postponed until the government considers they can start again "without creating any health risk"
